strings:
<tag_voice_0x01001A70><se_low>Morrie: Magnifico, <nickname>!
I never doubt it!
I could see you have the potential!
<tag_voice_0x01001A75><se_low>Morrie: You bring the breath of fresh air to my monstrous pit! Ha ha ha!

<tag_voice_0x01001A7A><se_low>Morrie: So! I suppose I should give you the reward, ay?
Something just for you!
<voice_0x01001A7F><se_low>Morrie: I have it!
<tag_voice_0x01001A80><se_low>Morrie: Up 'til now you could only get the three monsters at a time, ay?

<tag_voice_0x01001A85><se_low>Morrie: But now! Just for you, <nickname>!
In addition to your team, I make it so you
can keep another three monsters in reserve.

<voice_0x01001A8A><se_low>Morrie: So, you can mix and match your six monsters
to make the new team of three.
Think the tactics! Think the strategy!

<tag_voice_0x01001AA4><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! Splendido, <nickname>!
You are the real combattente, ay!?
So much GUSTO!
<tag_voice_0x01001AA9><se_low>Morrie: You keep it up, and you will go far in my monstrous pit! Maybe you surprise even yourself!

<voice_0x01001AAE><se_low>Morrie: You earn another reward.
Si, what can I give you...?
<voice_0x01001A7F><se_low>Morrie: I have it!
<voice_0x01001AAF><se_low>Morrie: Maybe you have the strong team. But you know what they say. You never know the depths of your own passion until you play with yourself, ay?

<tag_voice_0x01001AB0><se_low>Morrie: So, I give you this. You and only you will be able to do the battle against your own team!
It's like the training.

<voice_0x01001AB5><se_low>Morrie: And you don't even need to pay no money to fight your own team! This is my gift to you.
I know, I know. Ha ha, I am too kind!

<tag_voice_0x01001ABA><se_low>Morrie: You take my breathing away, <nickname>!
Before I know it, you become the owner of
the magnifico monster team, ay!?

<tag_voice_0x01001ABF><se_low>Morrie: You give my monstrous pit a good licking, ay!
I look forward to the exciting times ahead!
<voice_0x01001AC4><se_low>Morrie: What GUSTO! Now I give to you the prize.

<tag_voice_0x01001AC5><se_low>Morrie: I let you have the fantastico new skill!
Now you will be able to call your team to
fight for you even outside of the arena.

<Cap><hero> learns the special skill,
Call Team!
<voice_0x01001ACA><se_low>Morrie: But, remember this! Outside it is real fighting. Maybe it's not so smooth as down here in my pit!
<tag_voice_0x01001ACB><se_low>Morrie: Out in the world, your team can only fight in your place for a limited time.
<voice_0x01001AD0><se_low>Morrie: But this is still fantastico! It will be good for the fighting. If you are using it well, you will have the better travelling, ay?
<voice_0x01001AD1><se_low>Morrie: And one more thing you must remember!
<voice_0x01001AD2><se_low>Morrie: If one of your monsters is defeated out in the world, I am the only one who can bring it back to life.
<voice_0x01001AD3><se_low>Morrie: If this is happening, make sure you come to see me, okay? I am here for you!
<tag_voice_0x01001AD8><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! And they say everyone gets stuck at Rank D! But not you, ay, <nickname>!
<tag_voice_0x01001ADD><se_low>Morrie: You become the incredible monster team owner already! What can I say!?

<voice_0x01001AE2><se_low>Morrie: Soon maybe I be running out of prizes!
But not yet!
<voice_0x01001AE7><se_low>Morrie: For your victory prize today, I let you keep the three more monsters in reserve. Now you have the nine monsters to choose from for your team.
<voice_0x01001AED><se_low>Morrie: As they say, variety is the life of spices!

<se_low>Morrie: Like the streak of the blue, ay!?
You come from nowhere and make it to the <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE> of the Rank C in no time flat!
<se_low>Morrie: Most of the people are taking more than ten years to reach the Rank C! But you are not the most people, ay, <nickname>!
<se_low>Morrie: I wish I could give you some reward for the victory, but I have nothing! Mi dispiace!
<se_low>Morrie: But before I always give you something nice, ay. Hm...
<se_low>Morrie: Va bene! Here is what I do!

<tag_voice_0x01001AFC><se_low>Morrie: You make it to the next rank...
You become the <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE> of the Rank B,
and I will give you the grande prize!

<tag_voice_0x01001B05><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! I knew it!
I set the target, and it's like the red rag to the bulls, ay, <nickname>!?

<voice_0x01001B0A><se_low>Morrie: I keep my promise!
I give you the prize.
<tag_voice_0x01001B0B><se_low>Morrie: You will be the only one in the world to have this privilegio, <nickname>!
<tag_voice_0x01001B10><se_low>Morrie: You, and only you, will be the owner of not one, but TWO teams of the monsters!

<voice_0x01001B15><se_low>Morrie: Just think about it! With the two teams,
you will be formidabile in the outside world!

<voice_0x01001B16><se_low>Morrie: You could have the one team for attacking,
and the other team for the healing, ay?
You make the different combinazione!

<voice_0x01001B17><se_low>Morrie: This means we must give the name to your
new team!
<voice_0x01001991><se_low>Morrie: If you cannot think of a good name, I can do it for you. So, you wanna name your own team?
<tag_voice_0x010019A8><se_low>Morrie: Then let Morrie use his poetic genius to think of the perfect name for you!
<voice_0x010019A8><se_low>Morrie: Then let Morrie use his poetic genius to think of the perfect name for you!
<tag_voice_0x010019A3><se_low>Morrie: Va bene... Let me see...
<voice_0x0100199D><se_low>Morrie: Si! I am a genius!
<voice_0x01001B1D><se_low>Morrie: The Nine to Fivers!

<voice_0x010019AE><se_low>Morrie: Che!? You don't like it!?
Really? Va bene. I will think of another name.
<voice_0x01001B1E><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Worrying Whackers!?

<voice_0x010019B2><se_low>Morrie: Ay!? You don't like that one too?
Va bene...
<voice_0x01001B1F><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Cocky Cutlets!?
<voice_0x01001B20><se_low>Morrie: The Cheesy Chatterers!?
<voice_0x01001B21><se_low>Morrie: The Sweet Spankers!?
<voice_0x01001B22><se_low>Morrie: The Banana Benders!?
<tag_voice_0x010019B7><se_low>Morrie: Phew! Not an easy one to please, ay <nickname>!?
<voice_0x010019BC><se_low>Morrie: You must have a team name for registering your team. I go again, from the top!
<voice_0x01001B23><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Nine to Fivers?
<voice_0x01001B24><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Worrying Whackers?
<voice_0x01001B25><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Cocky Cutlets?
<voice_0x01001B26><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Cheesy Chatterers?
<voice_0x01001B27><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Sweet Spankers?
<voice_0x01001B28><se_low>Morrie: How about, the Banana Benders?
<tag_voice_0x010019EE><se_low>Morrie: You no like it? Then I try it again from the top for you, <nickname>!
<voice_0x010019ED><se_low>Morrie: You don't like it? Then I try it again from the top for you!

<voice_0x01001992><se_low>Morrie: So, you want to choose your own name?
It must be eighteen letters or less.
<tag_voice_0x0100199E><se_low>Morrie: You didn't like it? Then let me think of the name for you, <nickname>!

<voice_0x0100199B><se_low>Morrie: No good, ay?
Then let me think of the name for you!
<voice_0x01001994><se_low>Morrie: ‘<Cap><string_1>’, it is okay?

<voice_0x01001995><se_low>Morrie: That's your name!? Where is the forza,
the bravado, the PASSION, ay?
Ah, never mind! It will do!

<tag_voice_0x010019F3><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You have named your second team ‘<string_1>’!

<tag_voice_0x01001B18><se_low>Morrie: All you have left is the Rank A, ay, ay, AY!?
Are you as excited as me, <nickname>!?
The tension is really mounting in my pit, ay!
<voice_0x01001B31><se_low>Morrie: Mamma mia! I never thought I would see to live the day! You are one chip of an old block, ay!

!!! THIS MESSAGE SHOULD NOT APPEAR !!!
   e512_5a - event_msg810
<tag_voice_0x01001B43><se_low>Morrie: You believe in me, and you give it your best shooting, ay! Now look at a what the passion and the GUSTO have become!

<tag_voice_0x01001B48><se_low>Morrie: I have nothing more to give you, <nickname>!
But I can offer you one final challenge!

<tag_voice_0x01001B4D><se_low>Morrie: FIGHT ME! Become the strongest monster team owner in all the world!
Our passionate encounter will take place here,
in my MONSTROUS PIT!
<voice_0x01001B52><se_low>Morrie: This is the final rank! Rank S!
<voice_0x01001B53><se_low>Morrie: In rounds one and two of Rank S, you will fight against the two strongest monster teams I ever see.
<voice_0x01001B54><se_low>Morrie: And in the final round, you will fight ME!

<tag_voice_0x01001B55><se_low>Morrie: Okay, <nickname>! It is time for you to show just what you are made of!
Passion versus passion! GUSTO versus GUSTO!

<tag_voice_0x01001B5A><se_low>Morrie: And don't think I will be going easy with you!
I don't wish you the buona fortuna!
Now we are rivali!
<tag_voice_0x01001B5F><se_low>Morrie: I will be waiting for you in my pit!
<tag_voice_0x01001B99><se_low>Morrie: <Cap><nickname>!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001B9E><se_low>Morrie: No... Now I must call you <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>, ay!
<voice_0x01001BA3><se_low>Morrie: Everyday without the failure, I am here in arena, striving to make the better monster team.
<voice_0x01001BA4><se_low>Morrie: In my mind, all I am thinking is how to make the team stronger! How to give it more GUSTO!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001BA5><se_low>Morrie: But I am nothing compared to you, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!
<voice_0x01001BA7><se_low>Morrie: Grazie! You really make my dream come true!
<voice_0x01001BA8><se_low>Morrie: I been waiting for this day! For the momentous day I finally find the heir of my monstrous pit!

!!! THIS MESSAGE SHOULD NOT APPEAR !!!
   e512_5a - event_msg971

!!! THIS MESSAGE SHOULD NOT APPEAR !!!
   e512_5a - event_msg972

<tag_voice_0x01001BCF><se_low>Morrie: You fight a nice game, <nickname>.
You make the good challenge, ay!

<voice_0x01001BD4><se_low>Morrie: You don't feel sad just because you lose, okay?
You have to lose to make the team stronger.

<tag_voice_0x01001BDA><se_low>Morrie: Don't be throwing away the towel!
I am waiting with the bad breath
for your next battle, <nickname>!

<tag_voice_0x01001BCF><se_low>Morrie: You fight a nice game, <nickname>.
You make the good challenge, ay!

<tag_voice_0x01001BE7><se_low>Morrie: You have the bad luck, I think?
It seem like you have it in the sack in
the second half, but it is not enough.

<tag_voice_0x01001BEC><se_low>Morrie: Don't be throwing away the towel!
I am waiting with the bad breath
for your next battle, <nickname>!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!
<tag_voice_0x01001BD5><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<voice_0x01001BE3><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!

<voice_0x01001BCE><se_def>*: Bad luck.
But maybe things will go your way next time.

<voice_0x01001BE6><se_def>*: Bad luck.
But maybe things will go your way next time.

<voice_0x01001A6F><se_def>*: A most spectacular performance!
This is the prize for winning Rank G.
Congratulations!

<voice_0x01001AA3><se_def>*: A most spectacular performance!
This is the prize for winning Rank F.
Congratulations!

<voice_0x01001AB9><se_def>*: A most spectacular performance!
This is the prize for winning Rank E.
Congratulations!

<voice_0x01001AD7><se_def>*: A most spectacular performance!
This is the prize for winning Rank D.
Congratulations!

<voice_0x01001AF1><se_def>*: A most spectacular performance!
This is the prize for winning Rank C.
Congratulations!

<voice_0x01001B04><se_def>*: A most spectacular performance!
This is the prize for winning Rank B.
Congratulations!
<voice_0x01001B2F><se_def>*: Well! I didn't see that coming! I've been in this job a fair old while, let me tell you. But this is the first time I've ever seen anyone make it to Rank A!

<voice_0x01001B30><se_def>*: Here's your prize!
Well done! Fantastic!

<voice_0x01001B97><se_def>*: I, I'm lost for words.
I really don't know what to say.

<voice_0x01001B98><se_def>*: I suppose I should give you your prize, eh?
Here you are...

<voice_0x01001A92><se_def>*: A fantastic performance!
I suppose this rank's a bit easy for you now,
is it? We look forward to seeing you again, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>.
<voice_0x01001B64><se_def>*: Phew! It doesn't matter how many times I watch matches at this rank, it still has me on the edge of my seat!

!!! THIS MESSAGE SHOULD NOT APPEAR !!!
    e512_5a - event_msg11001
<Cap><leader> receives <INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_1> and puts <IF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1>them<ELSE_NOT_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1>it<ENDIF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1> in the bag.

<voice_0x01001A92><se_def>*: A fantastic performance!
I suppose this rank's a bit easy for you now,
is it?
<voice_0x01001A93><se_def>*: I'm looking forward to your next match!

<tag_voice_0x01001A94><se_low>Morrie: You like to do the practice, ay?
You run a tight shop, <nickname>!
You don't take no chances!
<tag_voice_0x01001BD5><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

right from the start, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>.
I'm looking forward to your next match!

You don't take no chances!
<tag_voice_0x01001BD5><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C04><se_def>*: Truly magnificent, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>!
You're welcome back any time, of course!

<tag_voice_0x01001C06><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! That's my <nickname>!
You take no pensioners,
even against your own team, ay!?
<tag_voice_0x01001BD5><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C11><se_def>*: Bad luck, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>. Although, it does show how strong your own team is. I can't quite get my head round it!
<tag_voice_0x01001C13><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! Having such the strong team is causing you the headaches, ay <nickname>!?
<tag_voice_0x01001BD5><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C1C><se_def>*: Oh, you bowed out early, did you <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>?
Well, come back any time!

<tag_voice_0x01001C1E><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! You enjoy your experimentations,
ay <nickname>!? You like the nutty doctor!
<tag_voice_0x01001BD5><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

But maybe things will go your way next time!

You can't help yourself, ay <nickname>!?
Always wanting to improve your team!
I be looking forwards to your next match!
<tag_voice_0x01001BD5><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

You're welcome back any time, of course!

You take no pensioners,
even against your own team, ay!?
<voice_0x01001C0D><se_low>Morrie: Do not worry <endash> I already give the life back to your dead team members!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001A9E><se_low>Morrie: I be waiting for your next great battle, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C23><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! You enjoy your experimentations,
ay <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!? You like the nutty doctor!
<voice_0x01001BE3><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001A9E><se_low>Morrie: I be waiting for your next great battle, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001BDF><se_def>*: Having an off day, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>?
Well, better luck next time!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001BDF><se_def>*: Having an off day, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>?
Well, better luck next time!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001A99><se_def>*: A top-class performance, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>!
Do come back soon and give the
teams of this rank another workout!
<voice_0x01001BCB><se_def>*: A heated tussle between you and Mister Mozzarella makes for a fine spectacle.
<voice_0x01001BCC><se_def>*: It's a real treat to be able to see you two locking horns up close like this!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001BE1><se_low>Morrie: I like your style, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!
Now you get to the top of my pit, you treat it like the bottom and work your way up some more, ay!?
<voice_0x01001BE3><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001BE4><se_low>Morrie: I be waiting for your next great battle, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!
<voice_0x01001BF6><se_low>Morrie: Fantastico!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001BF7><se_low>Morrie: You still had the somethings up your sleeves,
ay <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!? My eyes see everything!
They looking forwards at your next match!
<voice_0x01001BE3><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001A9E><se_low>Morrie: I be waiting for your next great battle, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001A9B><se_low>Morrie: Always working to get the better team!
That's the marking of a true <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>, ay!
<voice_0x01001BE3><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001A9E><se_low>Morrie: I be waiting for your next great battle, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001E01><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! I go down one more time!
Maybe I never be on top again, ay <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!?
<voice_0x01001BE3><se_low>Morrie: Don't worry, I have given the life back to your dead team members!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001A9E><se_low>Morrie: I be waiting for your next great battle, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!

<tag_voice_0x01001A70><se_low>Morrie: Magnifico, <nickname>!
I never doubt it!
I could see you have the potential!
<tag_voice_0x01001A75><se_low>Morrie: You bring the breath of fresh air to my monstrous pit! Ha ha ha!

<tag_voice_0x01001A7A><se_low>Morrie: So! I suppose I should give you the reward, ay?
Something just for you!
<voice_0x01001A7F><se_low>Morrie: I have it!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

<tag_voice_0x01001AA4><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! Splendido, <nickname>!
You are the real combattente, ay!?
So much GUSTO!
<tag_voice_0x01001AA9><se_low>Morrie: You keep it up, and you will go far in my monstrous pit! Maybe you surprise even yourself!

<voice_0x01001AAE><se_low>Morrie: You earn another reward.
Si, what can I give you...?
<voice_0x01001A7F><se_low>Morrie: I have it!
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

<tag_voice_0x01001ABA><se_low>Morrie: You take my breathing away, <nickname>!
Before I know it, you become the owner of
the magnifico monster team, ay!?

<tag_voice_0x01001ABF><se_low>Morrie: You give my monstrous pit a good licking, ay!
I look forward to the exciting times ahead!

<voice_0x01001AC4><se_low>Morrie: What GUSTO!
Now I give to you the prize.
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!
<tag_voice_0x01001AD8><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! And they say everyone gets stuck at the rank D! But not you, ay, <nickname>!
<tag_voice_0x01001ADD><se_low>Morrie: You become the incredible monster team owner already! What can I say!?

<voice_0x01001AE2><se_low>Morrie: Soon maybe I be running out of prizes!
But not yet!
<voice_0x01001AE7><se_low>Morrie: For your victory prize today, I let you keep the three more monsters in reserve. Now you have the nine monsters to choose from for your team.
<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

<tag_voice_0x01001A8B><se_low>Morrie: I wish you the buona fortuna for your next fight, ay, <nickname>!

<tag_voice_0x01001B18><se_low>Morrie: All you have left is the rank A, ay, ay, AY!?
Are you as excited as me, <nickname>!?
The tension is a really mounting in my pit, ay!

<tag_voice_0x01001B5A><se_low>Morrie: And don't think I will be going easy with you!
I don't wish you the buona fortuna!
Now we are rivali!
<tag_voice_0x01001B5F><se_low>Morrie: I will be waiting for you in my pit!

<se_low>!!! THIS MESSAGE SHOULD NOT APPEAR !!!

<tag_voice_0x01001AE8><se_low>Morrie: But now <endash> just for you, <nickname> <endash> in addition to your team, I make it so you can keep another SIX monsters in reserve.

<voice_0x01001AF2><se_low>Morrie: I did not predict you DESTROY the rank C like this, ay! You were in and out of my pit so fast,
I have no time to think of a prize for you!

<voice_0x01001AF3><se_low>Morrie: So, I think of it now.
Un momento, per favore.

<voice_0x01001AF4><se_low>Morrie: Hm...
Hmmm.........
<voice_0x01001AF5><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha, si, I have the answer! To celebrate this trionfo, I let you keep another three more monsters in reserve.
<voice_0x01001AF6><se_low>Morrie: Allora, from now on, you may choose your team from the twelve TERRIFICANTI beasts!
<voice_0x01001AFB><se_low>Morrie: You forgive me for the <endash> How do you say? <endash> same old shame old prize, ay?

<voice_0x01001B32><se_low>Morrie: Allora, this is the final prize. From now on,
I let you leave the twenty-one monsters in my caring. Si! VENTUNO!
Morrie: It means you are picking your team from the totale of twenty-four monsters.

<voice_0x01001B38><se_low>Morrie: With so much choices, you can try all
kinds of tricks and tactics in my pit, ay?
The possibilities are endingless!

<tag_voice_0x01001B39><se_low>Morrie: .........
<Cap><nickname>, I like to say grazie.
Thanks to you, ay.

<tag_voice_0x01001B3E><se_low>Morrie: When we have first met, it was just by chance.
But now... Now I know, it was meant to be!
<voice_0x01001B6E><se_low>Morrie: In rounds one and two of Rank S, I invite the two strongest monster teams I ever see.
<voice_0x01001B6F><se_low>Morrie: But, it is taking time to become in contact with these teams, ay? I have the many preparativi to make.
<tag_voice_0x01001B70><se_low>Morrie: If you do not mind it, <nickname>, I ask you to get lost for the while, ay?
<voice_0x01001B75><se_low>Morrie: Perhaps there are some monsters you have not found yet, hm?
<voice_0x01001B76><se_low>Morrie: Here, in my monstrous pit, you do not be satisfied EVER! Always, you must try to fortify your team.
<voice_0x01001B77><se_low>Morrie: If not, you will never rise above the ferocious opposizione that you face in Rank S.

<tag_voice_0x01001B78><se_low>Morrie: Va bene, <nickname>.
For the now, you wait, per favore.
<voice_0x01001BA9><se_low>Morrie: I have the one final prize for you. I give it to you in that fateful place where you and me have first met...
<voice_0x01001BF9><se_low>Morrie: So near and so far, ay?
<voice_0x01001BFA><se_low>Morrie: But think of this! Every time we go toes-to-toes, we fill my monstrous pit with even more GUSTO and PASSION! Magnifico!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C0E><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha, si, no questions!
This is the team of a great <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>!

<voice_0x01001C10><se_low>Morrie: When we fight together in my monstrous pit,
I feel it inside my loin...
The POWER of your PASSION!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C1A><se_low>Morrie: Si, the team of a <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>, it is potent thing! That we get our botties spanked is not surprise. But next time, we do the spanking, ay!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C4D><se_def>*: You really brought the house down there, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>! There's nothing quite like the atmosphere in here when you grace the pit.
<voice_0x01001C4F><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! Perfetto, perfetto!

<voice_0x01001C50><se_low>Morrie: You are the knees of the bees, ay?
In my pit, there is no one in this world
who can touch you.

<voice_0x01001C51><se_low>Morrie: But never forget, one day,
I will get the revenge, ay?
<voice_0x01001C52><se_low>Morrie: I will beat your hollows!
<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C53><se_low>Morrie: Because, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>, you and I, we are rivali. Rivali di GUSTO...up to the end!

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C55><se_def>*: But I always had my money on you, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>.
I'm looking forward to your next match already!
<voice_0x01001C57><se_low>Morrie: I see you are in top-tip form. I do not think we see someone take the crown from you today, ay? Ah ha ha!
